content:
Sean measured the height and petal length (in centimeters) of all the flowers in his garden.  

**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Height $(\text{cm})$** | $32.5$ | $20$ | $15$ | $35$ | $10$ | $37.5$ 
**Petal length $(\text{cm})$**| $5$ | $4$ | $2$ | $8$ | $1.5$ | $8.5$
